name: Spinel
body:
### Why another JS framework

One reason is author's interest. This framework is trying to adopt up-to-date components and practices and provide a core, light-weighted, and vender neutral tool to make creating web app easier. Another reason is for demo some technologies and practices in the book [Webcraft](http://homerquan.gitbooks.io/webcraft-everything-about-web-performance/content/) (welcome to like its [facebook page](https://www.facebook.com/betterwebapp) 

## What's spinel

* It's based on backbone (no more, no less, extendable core)
* It provides optimized resource management (on-demand loading to every bytes, no block as many as possible)
* It uses web components for large scale web apps (modulated, easy to test, reusable) 
* It's fast (Pure client-side routing, rendering)

## Extra

* It comes with API server [hippie](https://github.com/homerquan/hippie) or [Spinel mockup API server](https://github.com/homerquan/spinel-mock-api)
